name: Gravitytales Black for Dark Rooms
description:
I made this Style for dark rooms, or if you just want something that's easier on the eyes.

If you have any problems, or suggestions let me know.

If you like the style please Like and Share it.
additional_info:
Apparently, the website was remade, and my old style was pointless. So, I remade it.

Please, if the site changes again, and my style isn't working right, just leave a message here, and I'll update it. I don't go to Gravitytales website that often, and won't know if it changed.

I check Userstyles.org all the time though.
